features.featureTitle: In the Pricing section, add a short note under each pricing plan (Basic, Standard, Premium) that states “$50 deposit required” and includes a brief, clear reason (e.g., that the deposit covers initial work like creating a website preview/prototype before full development). Use English for the new user-facing copy and keep the note visually subordinate to the plan description (small text / muted styling) while still readable in the dark theme.
